A .htaccess file using SetEnv doesn't do anything in Apache 2.4.3, while it did in Apache 2.2.15.

The .htaccess file (unchanged from Apache 2.2.15):

SetEnv LD_LIBRARY_PATH /usr/lib:/opt/SUNWmotif/lib:/opt/x11r6/lib:/usr/openwin/lib:/usr/ucblib:/aopt/rational/releases/purify.sol.7.0.1/cache/sol8/usr/lib:/home/klim1/public_html/webls_lib:/home/klim1/public_html/webls_lib:/home/klim1/ARSperl/lib_701
AuthName "mobility.ih WebServer (Enter your web ID)"
AuthUserFile /info/www/dataweb/data/store/admin/.htpasswd
AuthGroupFile /home/klim1/.domestic_wtsc
AuthType Basic
<Limit GET POST>
require group domestic_wtsc
</Limit>

Basically the SetEnv directive does not change the LD_LIBRARY_PATH.

I have attached the 2.2.15 httpd.conf file.  Will attempt to attache the 2.4.3 httpd.conf after submitting the bug report.
